players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Alice, you were quiet last night. Any thoughts on Diana's death?"

Charlie: "That's an interesting way to start the discussion, Bob. We all were 'quiet' last night since it was the night phase. Diana's death tells us there's definitely one mafioso among the three of us remaining."
You: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out."
Charlie: "Alice, that's a very bold claim. If you're truly the detective and Bob is the mafioso, then we should definitely vote him out. Bob, how do you respond to this accusation?"
Bob: "Alice, if you're the real detective, why investigate me first instead of someone more suspicious? Charlie, she's trying to mislead us - I think she's the mafioso framing me."
You: "I am the detective. I investigated Bob and he is mafioso. We must vote him out now."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
